Do you know why you're standing here, ? It is your destiny to help me, favored pupil of the great Sorcerer Oshar. I'm capable of much more than hair-raising lotions.

I’m trying to find a way to protect a soldier—or a student of the eldritch mysteries—from electrocution.

Can you help me make anti-electrical history?"What do you need?"

I ask only that we each play to our strengths. I have an ingenious mind and an indomitable will. You...you're quite good at killing things, so I'm told.

I need a lock of hair from the sloths that run rampant through this so-called garden. Yes, really...sloths.

My theory has to do with wet fur and static electricity. It's sympathetic magic. You wouldn't understand.

You have a talent for violence, .

Finally, I can now create my masterpiece: the dampening shroud.

I need much more sloth hair to weave a dampening shroud!

...to complete my experiment, I mean! Definitely that!
